Oakdale Commons Shuttle

Description:

The Oakdale Commons Shuttle leaves campus and stops at the Oakdale Commons and Wegmans enroute back to campus.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
The Oakdale Commons Shuttle runs from 2:25 P.M. on Weekdays until 9:25 P.M..

Before 2:25 P.M., please use the BC Transit Route 17 for service to/from the Oakdale Commons, Wegmans, and Binghamton University.


Weekends:
The Oakdale Commons Shuttle runs from 11:00 A.M. until 10:10 P.M. (Sundays) or 8:50 P.M. (Sundays).

Before 2:25 P.M., please use the BC Transit Route 48 for service to/from the Oakdale Commons, Wegmans, and Binghamton University.

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of this route, its schedule, and its stops with links to stop pictures and Google Maps location pins so that you can easily find your stop, and know when your bus is expected to arrive.
